### Generator and Fuel Tank Project - Iqaluit, Nunavut
#### Solicitation Number: M5000-22-1166/A

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites bids for the Generator and Fuel Tank Project in Iqaluit, Nunavut. This procurement is set aside for Indigenous businesses listed on the Inuit Firm Registry (IFR).

**Project Overview**

The project involves the replacement of the existing diesel generator and aboveground petroleum storage tank at an existing facility in Iqaluit, Nunavut. The successful contractor will be required to complete the work by October 31st, 2024.

**Pre-requisites**

To be eligible, contractors must meet the following requirements:

* Be listed on the Inuit Firm Registry (IFR)
* Be a beneficiary of the Nunavut Land Claims Agreement under the Treasury Board Directive on Government Contracts, Including Real Property Leases, in the Nunavut Settlement Area
* Have an interest in obtaining the tender documents and submit bids by emailing [sandrarobinson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:sandrarobinson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca) with the following information: 
    - Email address
    - Mailing address
    - Where you would like the information sent to

**Procurement Details**

* Solicitation closes on February 8th, 2023 at 2:00 pm MST (Mountain Standard Time)
* Basis of selection: Highest combined point rating of the Inuit Benefit Plan, including Inuit Benefits Criteria (IBC), Nunavut Benefits Criteria (NBC), and Price
* Procurement method: Competitive – Limited tendering
* Attachments: None
